data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Perkins, Philip D. (2005): A revision of the South African endemic humicolous beetle genus Discozantaena Perkins and Balfour­Browne (Coleoptera: Hydraenidae). Zootaxa 915: 1-48, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.171035
